item.description:
Please Update Your RSVPs. Tickets must be purchased in advance from Boston Uncorked. 

Here is another great Wine Tasting from Boston Uncorked. The event will take place from 7:00 - 9:00 PM on Thursday, November 8. Their last event at this venue last winter sold out. It will sell out this time too so if you want to go purchase your tickets from Boston Uncorked now. 

Members from Tonya's Boston Happy Hour group will be joining us. 

Join Boston Uncorked for their Fall Kick Off Celebration featuring an exclusive portfolio Tasting of 90+ Cellars Wines at Aragosta Bar & Bistro in Boston's historic North End.  Boston Uncorked will provide the wine, food and stunning harbor views... all we have to do is sit back and enjoy their Wines On The Wharf!  

Tickets are $39.00 per person. There are no Maybe RSVPs since you must purchase a ticket in advance. To purchase your ticket go to www.bostonuncorked.com[url=http://www.bostonuncorked.com][/url]  Please do not call or contact any other source regarding tickets.

The Aragosta Bistro is located at 3 Battery Wharf with Google Map/GPS address at 377 Commercial Street, Boston, 02109 

We had a great time there last February.

 

See you there.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at 6:45pm in lobby or inside during the event.
item.name: Wines On The Wharf with Boston Uncorked at Aragosta Bistro
